text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump To bad Brett Baier & Niel Cavuto et al can’t do research! There’s an exclusive Global license w Cedars-Sinai to employ proprietary methods of administering intermittent UV light via a novel endotracheal medical device, may help COVID-19 patients! President didn’t say drink Lysol!
